name: 100W LED Explosion Proof Light, 14000LM, 5000K Daylight Flood Lights Fixture, UL844 Certified Class I Division II Hazardous Locations Industry Luminaires Warehouse Lighting IP66 Waterproof, 100-277V
short_description: 【UL844 Authorized Certification + Multi-Layer Explosion-Proof Protection】Certified by the U.S. UL844 professional explosion-proof certification, compliant with Class I Division 2 (Groups A/B/C/D), Class II (Groups E/F/G), Class III, and other standards for use in hazardous locations. Features a military-grade explosion-proof structural design, with a high-pressure die-cast aluminum housing combined with special sealing technology to effectively isolate sparks, ensuring absolute safety in flammable and explosive environments such as oil, chemical, and coal mining industries.

【14,000 lumens ultra-bright lighting + Meanwell top-tier driver】Equipped with high-quality SMD LED chips, it delivers 14,000 lumens of ultra-high brightness at 100W power, equivalent to the lighting effect of a traditional 250W metal halide lamp. Using Meanwell brand professional drivers, it achieves a luminous efficacy of 135LM/W, saving over 70% energy. With a natural light color temperature of 5000K and a color rendering index (CRI) of Ra>80, it provides a clear and realistic visual experience, along with 120° wide-angle uniform lighting without glare.

【Aviation-grade aluminum alloy + extreme environment adaptability】 The housing is made of aviation-grade aluminum alloy, combining lightweight and high-strength characteristics, with an anodized surface treatment for corrosion resistance. The operating temperature range is -40°C to +60°C, with military-grade heat dissipation design ensuring instant startup in extremely cold environments and continuous operation without degradation in high-temperature environments. Wide voltage AC 100-277V input, suitable for various power environments.

【Smart Dimming + Industrial-Grade Durability Design】Supports 0-10V/PWM smart dimming, with brightness adjustable from 10% to 100%, to meet the needs of different scenarios. Modular anti-vibration structure design, passed 5G vibration testing, with an ultra-long lifespan of 50,000 hours. Offers multiple installation options including pole mounting, wall mounting, and ceiling mounting. IP66 protection rating withstands high-pressure water jet washing and dust intrusion, while 10KV surge protection ensures stable operation during thunderstorms.

【Professional Applications + Quality Assurance】Specifically designed for hazardous environments such as oil platforms, chemical plants, underground coal mines, grain silos, and pharmaceutical production facilities. Certified to CE/RoHS standards, with a 3-year extended warranty and professional after-sales support. Compared to traditional explosion-proof lights, it achieves over 70% energy savings, significantly reducing operational costs, making it an ideal choice for industrial lighting upgrades.
product_description: Professional Industrial Explosion-Proof LED Lighting - 100W Hazardous Location Light **Key Features:** 1. **Military-Grade Safety Protection** - UL844 certified for Class I Div 2 (Groups A/B/C/D), Class II (Groups E/F/G), and Class III hazardous locations - High-pressure die-cast aluminum alloy explosion-proof housing with triple sealing technology - IP66 rating withstands high-pressure water jets and dust ingress, with 10KV surge protection 2. **Superior Optical Performance** - Premium SMD LED chips deliver 14,000 lumens at 100W power - Powered by Meanwell LED driver with 135LM/W efficacy (70%+ energy savings) - 5,000K natural white light with Ra>80 CRI and 120° wide beam angle 3. **Extreme Environment Durability** - Operating range: -40℃ to +60℃ (-40°F to 140°F) - Aerospace-grade aluminum alloy housing with excellent heat dissipation - Anodized surface treatment with C5-M corrosion resistance rating 4. **Smart Control System** - 0-10V/PWM dimmable (10%-100% range) - Universal AC100-277V input voltage - Instant start with flicker-free operation 5. **Industrial-Grade Construction** - Modular design with 5G vibration resistance - 50,000-hour lifespan reduces maintenance costs - Multiple mounting options (pendant, wall, ceiling) **Technical Specifications:** - Power: 100W - Lumens: 14,000LM - Protection: IP66 - Temperature Range: -40℃ to +60℃ - Input Voltage: AC100-277V - Lifespan: 50,000 hours **Applications:** ✓ Oil & Gas: Refineries, chemical plants ✓ Mining: Underground operations ✓ Food Processing: Flour mills ✓ Hazardous Storage ✓ Marine: Offshore platforms

name: AKK Full & Semi Cutoff LED Wall Pack Light, Selectable 150W/120W/100W & 3000K/4000K/5000K & Timed Dimming & Photocell, 22500LM IP65 Waterproof 100-277V ETL-Listed Commercial & Industrial Flood Light
short_description: 😄2-IN-1 Full & Semi Cutoff Selectable - The commercial LED Wall Pack offers both Full Cutoff & Semi Cutoff options in a single light. Choose Full Cutoff for precise, downward-focused light that minimizes glare and uplight. Choose Semi Cutoff for a broad, 120° security flood. Or Activate Both simultaneously for complete area coverage. This on-site configurability adapts a single fixture to diverse needs, from dark-sky sensitive facades to expansive parking lots.

😄3-Wattage & 3-CCT Tunable: Match Light to Your Exact Need - Eliminate guesswork and inventory of multiple SKUs. During installation, select your ideal output: 150W (22,500 LM) for optimal illumination at higher mounting points (22-25 ft), 120W for standard areas, or 100W for perimeter security. Simultaneously, set the ambiance by choosing 3000K Warm White, 4000K Neutral White, or 5000K Daylight. This ensures perfect lighting for warehouses, workshops, or building exteriors.

😄Timed Dimming & Dusk to Dawn Photocell - The Photocell detects ambient light and then Auto turning the Wall Pack ON at sunset and OFF at sunrise. The Timed Dimming function adjusts brightness: the LED Wall Pack operates at 100% brightness at first 6 hours, 50% from 6 to 9 hours, and 30% from 9 hours until OFF. Disabling the Timed Dimming and Photocell functions is easy – simply slide the switch to OFF for manual control. Enjoy up to 85% electricity bill savings with the Wall Pack Light, delivering versatile and efficient lighting solutions.

😄Quick & Simplified Installation: Pre-Drilled for Fast, Professional Mounting – Engineered to reduce on-site labor time and cost. Featuring pre-fabricated mounting holes and multiple conduit knockouts, it installs directly onto standard junction boxes, fitting brick, concrete, or metal siding. This streamlined design enables a secure, code-compliant installation to be completed in under 10 minutes by a qualified professional, ideal for both retrofit and new construction projects.

😄Built for Harsh Conditions with Full Support - Designed for reliable performance outdoors, this fixture features a rugged aluminum housing and IP65 waterproof construction. It is ETL certified for safety and comes with a 5-year guarantee. For project planning, lighting layouts, or technical support, our dedicated team is available to assist, ensuring reliable performance for all commercial and industrial applications, Just contact us via Amazon message for 24/7 after-sales service.

product_description: 2-Pack IP66 Waterproof LED Outdoor Flood Light Light up large outdoor spaces with confidence using this 100W LED Outdoor Flood Light 2-Pack, designed to deliver powerful, reliable, and energy efficient illumination for both residential and commercial needs. Each flood light is equipped with 168 premium LEDs, producing up to 13,000 lumens of crisp 6000K daylight white light. With a wide 120° beam angle, it eliminates dark corners and shadows, making it ideal for security lighting and area coverage. Built for performance and longevity, this LED flood light features a fin-style heat sink and high-quality materials that promote fast heat dissipation and stable operation. Advanced LED technology reduces energy consumption by 50% or more compared to traditional halogen flood lights, helping lower electricity bills while delivering bright, flicker-free lighting that’s easy on the eyes. Designed to withstand harsh environments, these security flood lights carry an IP66 waterproof rating, ensuring dependable operation in rain, snow, heat, and cold. Whether installed outdoors year-round or used in demanding work environments, this flood light is made to last. Installation is fast and beginner-friendly. The built-in plug allows immediate use, while adjustable brackets and included mounting hardware let you install each flood light on walls, ceilings, or floors in just 3–5 minutes. Adjust the angle easily to direct light exactly where it’s needed. Perfect for garages, yards, gardens, stadiums, playgrounds, arenas, patios, warehouses, construction sites, and sports fields, this versatile flood light set provides dependable brightness wherever safety and visibility matter most. Backed by strict quality testing and responsive customer support, this flood light solution offers performance you can trust every day.
